document_data.name: Fire Opal
document_data.mainbody: '''Fire opal''' was a rare [[Gem stones|gem stone]] usually found near hot springs and geysers.
document_data.Description: '''Fire opal''' was a brilliant orange-red form of [[opal]] that was usually solid in color but could have golden or greenish flashes.
document_data.Powers: They were the favored gems to use in ''[[helm of brilliance|helms of brilliance]]''. Their affinity for igniting, releasing, and controlling fire made them useful in formulating inks to inscribe scrolls, enchanting immersions for making items, and mounting on devices as a focal point of discharge.
document_data.Reputation: Fire opals were considered prized gems among the [[drow]]. It was actually one of their favorites.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Many sages believed that fire opals' glow was supernatural in nature and even that each gem held a tiny portal to the ''[[Elemental Plane of Fire]]''. This theory was often debated by scholars who claimed that the glow was simply due to gems' light refraction.
